titleInfo.title: ‘Zircooa Island from the Eastward dist.t about 2 miles. From a Sketch by Dr Mackell’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions: 66 x 582 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Watercolour, pen and ink and pencil on paper.The coastal view drawn by Lieutenant Michael Houghton from a sketch by Dr A. Mackell showing topography of the Zircooa Island [Zirkūh, United Arab Emirates]. The view was sketched from on board ship and shows the profile of Zircooa Island from the east with latitude reported.
